title: League players don't usually say "noob"
body:
Just wanna let anyone who's new to the game know that the quickest way to let everyone else know you yourself are new to the game is by calling someone a noob. 

I've been playing for almost seven years now, and even when I was actually new, people didn't say noob. It's just... not normal for League. If someone wants to call you bad, they call you bronze, a feeder, boosted, or even just trash. But it's only people who started within the last year or so that think it's normal to say noob.

replies.body: Iron memes are on the rise, bronze is the new challenger.
We don't call them noobs. We call them junglers.
ive never been called a noob by anyone above level 20

> [{quoted}](name=Dr Dog,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AVB6gX5A,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2018-12-18T03:50:35.149+0000)
>
> ive never been called a noob by anyone above level 20

Exactly. Not sure why all the comments are agreeing, but the thread is net negative for votes. lol
its all eune players, noob is still a thing over there
We did say noob but we drop that in season 5 and started calling everyone trash instead.

> [{quoted}](name=LordGeovanni,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AVB6gX5A,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-12-18T01:19:21.433+0000)
>
> We did say noob but we drop that in season 5 and started calling everyone trash instead.

Not that I saw. As I said, I've been playing since season 2 and it wasn't normal then. Sure it happens in other games, but the community of this game in particular doesn't.

Can only talk for myself in other  online games me or my freinds or clanmates call casual players noobs (including myself sometimes.
As for lol i  dont call ppl noobs cuz i dont think  noobs are on the level of stupidness that some leage player reaches during the time i play, so i call them something else i rly do think they are hence trash boosted monkey assclown and noob is not something i want to say someone i could strangle whit hatered.

> [{quoted}](name=Aseraan,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=AVB6gX5A,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-12-18T00:28:31.434+0000)
>
> Can only talk for myself in other  online games me or my freinds or clanmates call casual players noobs (including myself sometimes.
> As for lol i  dont call ppl noobs cuz i dont think  noobs are on the level of stupidness that some leage player reaches during the time i play, so i call them something else i rly do think they are hence trash boosted monkey assclown and noob is not something i want to say someone i could strangle whit hatered.

That's... exactly my point. It's normal in OTHER games, but has never been normal in League.
Yes but the dumb old folks who write commercials for video games have JUST now realized that "noob" is a gamer term and by god they're gonna use it!  Gotta stay hip with the kids, yo!

noob is for beginners.
it kinda just gets tossed around in alot of games.
you always see it in league.
I never called someone a "noob" unless I am memeing, calling my friends that for fun, or making fun of someone who actually uses it in a serious manner.
It's a bannable keyword since Tribunal times. Its non-existence in the game is evolutionary.

Ive been saying "newb" (not "noob" spelled like a 7 year old) since i was 12 playing starcraft 1. Its part of my vernacular. Its not fucking game specific. Its not a term I use often. If someone is new, theyre a newb. As in newby, new to the game, newb. Theres tons of veteran bronze players. I dont use newb as an insult, its just a state of being. Its not some trendy cool thing to say, its just a fuckin word. If youre new, youre a newb, not trash, not bronzie. Sorry i dont conform to your league bullshit.
